sathi anthe galu kotuwata giya.mama nam oona tharam gihin thiyenawa.athithedi.meda giye daruwange adhyapana katayuththakata.api yana kale wage nemeyi.ada inna pemwathun diha balannath apahasuyi me awurudu hathara pahata minissu godak pirihila kiyala mata hithuna.putha podi nisa amathara prashna ahuwe naha.eeka hithata aswasillak una.pawure eka konaka lassana pawulak.punchi ewun denna ayis palam dekak kaka pimme duwapana awidinawa.ammayi thaththayi lassanata thuruluwela(asabhya widiyata nemeyi)monawado thora thonchiyak nathuwa kathawa.issara eyalath pemwathun wela iddi aawa gaman gana wenna athi baga welawata.ee athara mada chuti ewun denna ganath balanawa.mama baluwe mage daruwange thaththa diha.thawama aathata nogiya yauwanaya mama ee deta polambaawanna athi.eeth ohu andhayek goluwek ganata sithijaya diha balaà·gena.athitha mathaka hithata gala eddi mata danune daraganna bari dukak.wedanawak.hithe dukath nethe pirunu kaduluth atharin mama bala unne ara lassana pawula diha.ee thaththage senehe patawunta wagema ammatath laba dena sathuta,rakawaranaya mahamerak wage.mata ehema sathutak rakawaranayak nathath mage patawunta labena senehasa gana hithala mama sanasuna.eeth eekath kawuruhari uduraganna hadanawa wage hagimak iwak mata mathaka idala danenawa.(deyiyane ehema nam wenna epa)mamapodiyakata hari labu sathuta gulikarala akulagannawa wage eyala idagena unna koleth akulagena hari bari gahila punchi pawula pitinma eyalage yathuru padiyata goda una.mama noliyuwa kawiya ee aadaraniya gahaniyage as athule mama dakka.yadditath wada loku barak hithe daragena aapahu aawath danatath magehithe ee sundara punchi pawula lagum aran innawa.
